meanings.definition: The position or role of a guru.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient village, the guruship was passed down from generation to generation.
meanings.sent2: The guruship of the spiritual leader was respected by all the followers.
meanings.sent3: The guruship of the wise guru made him the go-to person for advice.
meanings.sent4: Her guruship in meditation guided many seekers on their spiritual journey.
meanings.sent5: The guruship of the yoga instructor inspired her students to reach new heights.

meanings.definition: The authority or leadership of a guru.
meanings.sent1: The guruship of the guru was unquestioned by the disciples.
meanings.sent2: His guruship in the community helped resolve conflicts peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The guruship of the guru in choosing the best tea was always a topic of discussion.
meanings.sent4: Under his guruship, the team achieved great success in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The guruship of the mentor guided the apprentice through difficult decisions.
